dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A ninefold increase in Chinese tourists to Kazakhstan since 2019—that's just staggering.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A ninefold increase in Chinese tourists to Kazakhstan since twenty nineteen-that's just staggering.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tourist flow from China to Kazakhstan has increased ninefold since 2019, according to data from Kazakh Tourism. In 2024, the number of tourists from China visiting Kazakhstan showed an impressive surge, growing nearly nine times compared to the pre-pandemic year of 2019.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's not just a blip, right? Kazakh Tourism's data shows over 650,000 Chinese visitors last year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's not just a blip, right? Kazakh Tourism's data shows over six hundred fifty thousand Chinese visitors last year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Overall, over 650,000 Chinese citizens visited Kazakhstan, according to the company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and they're now the second-largest group staying in hotels there. 173,987 hotel stays from Chinese citizens alone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and they're now the second-largest group staying in hotels there. one hundred seventy three thousand, nine hundred eighty seven hotel stays from Chinese citizens alone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By the end of 2024, China ranked second in the number of foreign tourists accommodated in Kazakh hotels and other lodging facilities. A total of 173,987 Chinese citizens stayed in hotels " a 66% increase compared to 2023.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is a 66% jump from 2023. I mean, that kind of growth doesn't just happen by accident.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is a sixty six percent jump from twenty twenty three. I mean, that kind of growth doesn't just happen by accident.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A total of 173,987 Chinese citizens stayed in hotels " a 66% increase compared to 2023.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: No, they've been really strategic about it. Like those B2B meetings in Guangzhou with over 50 Chinese tourism reps.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, they've been really strategic about it. Like those B2B meetings in Guangzhou with over fifty Chinese tourism reps.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the company's press service, B2B meetings were recently held in Guangzhou, where Kazakh tour operators met with over 50 Chinese tourism industry representatives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they held more than 30 events in China last year to promote Kazakhstan—exhibitions, cultural stuff, info tours.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they held more than thirty events in China last year to promote Kazakhstan-exhibitions, cultural stuff, info tours.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2024 alone, more than 30 events were organized in China to promote Kazakhstan's tourism " including business meetings, exhibitions, cultural presentations, and info tours.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Plus another 16 planned for this year. They're really pushing it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus another sixteen planned for this year. They're really pushing it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another 16 events are planned for this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's working, though! Remember that report back in January? Tourist numbers were already up 17 times at that point.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's working, though! Remember that report back in January? Tourist numbers were already up seventeen times at that point.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Interestingly, in January 2024, it was reported by 24KZ that tourist arrivals from China had increased 17 times at that point.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it just kept climbing. Kazakhstan's clearly becoming a hot spot for Chinese travelers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it just kept climbing. Kazakhstan's clearly becoming a hot spot for Chinese travelers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan is becoming an increasingly attractive destination for Chinese travelers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. The cultural presentations and all that outreach—it's paying off big time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. The cultural presentations and all that outreach-it's paying off big time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder what other destinations might try to replicate this model.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder what other destinations might try to replicate this model.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. But Kazakhstan's got a head start with all these targeted efforts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. But Kazakhstan's got a head start with all these targeted efforts.
